message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $1000000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. This is a great compromise, considering its value to me is at least $1000000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $880000, but that's as high as I can go.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000. This is as low as I can go, considering its value to me is at least $1000000. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $875000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
